title: End game chat doesn't connect 70% of the time.
body: About 70% of the time after a game the chat won't connect and I don't know what's causing it.

replies.body: So you're able to see the post-game lobby but the chat never loads up? Hmmmmm well it sounds like your connection is pretty stable except for that one little bit. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and make sure to pay attention to the steps about DNS and Port Forwarding. Let me know if that helps!
